mapper.insert: insert into order_detail (name, image, order_id, dish_id, setmeal_id, dish_flavor, number, amount) values (#{name},#{image},#{orderId},#{dishId},#{setmealId},#{dishFlavor},#{number},#{amount});
mapper.select: select name as name,sum(number) as number from order_detail where order_id in ( select id from orders where `status` = 5 and order_time between #{begin} and #{end}) group by COALESCE(dish_id, setmeal_id) order by sum(number) desc LIMIT 0,10;
